entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow level rising to 900 metres in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
